Writer: Gene Roddenberry (television series Star Trek), Leonard Nimoy (story), Harve Bennett (story), Steve Meerson (screenplay), Peter Krikes (screenplay), Harve Bennett (screenplay), Nicholas Meyer (screenplay)
Title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
Actors: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley, James Doohan
Plot: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 13 nominations.
